translations: 开锁（unlock 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: The only time we think of unlocking our self improvement power is when everything gets worst.
sentences.translation: 只有在一切都变糟的时候，我们才会想要释放自我提升的力量。

sentences.sentence: Unlocking our self improvement power means unlocking ourselves out of the box of thought that is just the way we are.
sentences.translation: 释放我们自己提升的力量意味着将我们自己从认为自己就是这样的盒子里解放出来。

sentences.sentence: Unlocking the conference allows them to join.
sentences.translation: 对会议解除锁定后，参与者即可加入到会议中。
